lender.occupational_info: Retired. I volunteer at a food pantry and with a homeless assitance organization

lender.name: Rahenna
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Sunshine in PDX

lender.name: Dario
lender.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people.

lender.name: Errington W Watkins
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference no matter how small or great in someones life
lender.occupational_info: I am a trained electronic tech/ electro-mechanic with over 30 years experience. I enjoy sharing my knowledge and helping any one I can if I can to make a difference in their lives and give me great joy to know I could help someone as Jesus said we should.

lender.name: Simon
lender.occupational_info: SaleHoo is a global online product sourcing directory and community helping ecommerce traders, entrepreneurs and traditional retailers connect with each other, and with verified wholesalers, drop shippers, liquidators and drop shippers.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe one of the best ways out of poverty and to hence, create thriving communities is through micro-lending.
lender.occupational_info: I consult small and medium-sized businesses on starting and running their companies, including advice and implementation of social media strategies, marketing, networking and business development.

lender.name: Lanette
lender.loan_because: I've been incredibly blessed and want to give something back. I want to make a difference and help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist that does jewelry and photography. I love using my creativity to make inspiring pieces that help people stay happy, positive and motivated. I'm also a life coach who encourages and teaches people to "Live Happy" and become the person they were created to be.

lender.name: Lex
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be given a helping hand when it's needed.

lender.name: InspiredLotus
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I believe I can!

lender.name: Christine
lender.occupational_info: As an Anthropologist, and archaeologist, I work to promote understanding of diversity and to facilitate the powerful learning possible in cross-cultural exchanges.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: this is an amazing idea!
lender.occupational_info: I edit and shoot video. I freelance for various TV networks and also enjoy making my own films.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: we've all needed a helping hand at one time or another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former elementary school Art teacher, and am currently a full time visual artist and singer. I'm also a very proud mother of one fantastic daughter...

lender.name: Teague Ventures
lender.loan_because: We are a small business in the U.S. We want others to have the same opportunities that we have been given. Then give them the opportunity by letting their repayment be seed money for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: We own a event rental company that services the mid-south region of the United States.

lender.name: markzavious
lender.loan_because: Becuase God says give to the Poor and needy arround the globe
lender.occupational_info: my work is in commercial finance, I have a website that details what our company does for clients worldwide wanting build porject arround the world, like hotesl, resorts, casinos, etc

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: Test effectiveness of online advertising.

lender.name: Robert & Diane
lender.loan_because: I thought it was cool, and we could afford it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a free lance potter in my basement.

lender.name: Grant Wiebe
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a really efficient way of correcting the imbalance a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have a good job and I want to share what I've been given.
lender.occupational_info: I manage financial data for a local newspaper.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place even if it is just a little bit at a time.

lender.name: bryan
lender.loan_because: 1) Feels good 2) I can afford the risk 3) Life's hard, but I've been lucky 4) Do good for goodness' sake!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
I understand what it is like to try and function with limited means and the value of help from another that might have a little extra capital to share and help one overcome that barrier to achieve greater things. I also understand that as an American, I have the opportunity to help others that have much less to work with.
I'm excited to see what comes of helping others through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build websites for state government agencies in the state of Minnesota, United States of America.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to see women succeed.

lender.name: Dunewood Homes
lender.loan_because: Realizing how fortunate we are, we take a sum from each real estate closing and give to a charity. Having endured tough times, we realize it is important to help, and even a little bit can make a difference. We have given to relatives in Serbia, our local Humane Society and women's shelter, and the Unity Foundation - a LaPorte County Indiana organization that helps charitable causes. We were intrigued by Kiva, and decided to participate. This is just a great way to help make a real difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell properties in Northwest Indiana, specializing in properties for horse owners. At times we purchase distressed/abandoned properties, rehab, and sell at affordable prices to first time homebuyers.

lender.name: george
lender.loan_because: I have love for poor people and deprived communities. My life is for the honor of the rejected.
lender.occupational_info: I try , with the support of friends empower youth in derived communities all over my country. I have helped built eco (compost toilets) for such communities. I have built an ultra modern library and IT center for one such community.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it matters.

lender.name: Lacey
lender.loan_because: I believe it's our responsibility as people to help out our fellow humans.
lender.occupational_info: I work with disabled people to give them more indepedence and life skills.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I'm a professional evangelist. I use all tools at my disposal to promote your business and cause as well as America, Israel, their current and future inhabitants. If you have a need that fits, contact me. Learn more at www.asgroupinc.com
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professional evangelist. I use all tools at my disposal to promote your business and cause as well as America, Israel, their current and future inhabitants. If you have a need that fits, contact me. Learn more at www.asgroupinc.com

lender.occupational_info: ex-software management (I don't miss it). Caring for family members, helping others, healing myself

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: Helping my brother run his catering business.

lender.name: Harry

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Agnes
lender.loan_because:
Sometimes I spend so much money for so unimportant things. Here I know, that the people get their money. I believe in little steps !
Kiva loans are like potato chips, you can't stop at one once you get started.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to
lender.occupational_info: I help raise deposits from foundations in order to help fund community development and conservation lending in low to moderate income neighbourhoods

lender.name: Kiara
lender.loan_because: As children most of us were taught to share and here is a chance to do just that - thank you for the opportunity KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: I take beautiful flowers and make arrangements in vases so that people can celebrate special moments in their lives.

lender.name: eleanor
lender.loan_because: I believe in a hand up, not a handout

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because:
~ I believe in reaching out to people with purpose.
What affects one person affects all of us.
I am tired of selfish greed ruling the world and I want to help even one person for that change.
I want to give the helping hand that I was never given.
~
lender.occupational_info: I am a Masters student in Portland, Oregon.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help schools run better, serve students more effectively, and mold a more hopeful future.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: cause I can do that
lender.occupational_info: It's tough doing what I do. It's a dirty game, but somebody gotta do it. I'm 20 years old and since I've been selling "the good stuff" I was able to provide for my family and put food on the table. So I feel blessed by the lord God for giving me the opportunity to give back to the community.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It's a small way that I am able to help someone I've never met in a way that might change their life. I may not be able to visit all of the countries and people in need, but I can do this. One person, one loan at a time.

lender.name: Abhilash Patel
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make money from the web.

lender.name: Molly Ayn
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to help people help themselves - to give aid in a way that builds confidence and independence, particularly for women. Here, I know who gets my money, what it's for, and it's so easy to make a real, meaningful difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach University classes on Greek, Latin, and the ancient world. I also knit custom garments for clients on the side.

lender.name: Haley
lender.loan_because: It's for a community service project at my university

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to assist people who are less fortunate, reminds me to be grateful for what I do, and don't, have...
lender.occupational_info: I help people to enjoy what they have got, get less or what they don't want and more of what they do!

lender.name: Marie

lender.occupational_info: Je gagne ma vie en racontant ce qui se passe autour de moi et √† l'int√©rieur des gens.

lender.name: Noa Kolnoa

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I feel that the $25 is worth more to those who I am lending to than it is to me.
lender.occupational_info: I design components of machines that manufacture gears. These gears are used in anything from automobiles to helicopters.

lender.loan_because: I like helping people and it keeps me from spending it myself. I hope to lend much more soon! :D
lender.occupational_info: Helping people with their spiritual needs.

lender.name: Mike, Dana, & Sharky
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I write, direct, shoot, and edit corporate videos. I also make beer, but no one is offering to pay me for that.

lender.occupational_info: I am a university student, and am a psychology major.

lender.name: elisia
lender.loan_because: When I loan even $25.00 to someone, I know it will make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Chris Campbell
lender.loan_because: I love to support entrepreneurs from around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies grow their business on the internet.

lender.name: THEKID
lender.loan_because: Our mission is to improve and secure the future of humanity (THEKIDZ). We aim to protect the welfare and being of the future from physical, mental, and sexual abuse. Through awareness, persistence and a constant presence WE CAN BREAK THE CYCLE! We will secure the future by educating with the knowledge of what hasn't worked in the past; and work together on formulating a future plan that works humanely and environmentally. Implementing all the wisdom, scientific, and technological advancements at our disposal to guarantee the success of the future. IT'S TIME TO CHANGE, AND UNITED WE WILL MAKE THE DIFFERENCE AND IMPROVE THE FUTURE OF HUMANITY!
lender.occupational_info: Improving the security of the future of humanity!

lender.name: Solmaz
lender.loan_because: Helping people to meet their goals in their career path enabling them to provide a better life for themselves and their families and to eventually develop their community.

lender.occupational_info: I rent re-usable moving boxes to people to not only make their moving experience easier, but to also reduce their carbon footprint. lender.occupational_info: I design websites and do graphic design.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I keep library books in order and help library patrons find material.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am looking forward to helping people create new opportunities for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an inflight crewmember on a major US airline. I am responsible for the safety and comfort of the passengers aboard my flights.

lender.name: The Bacarella Family
lender.loan_because: We believe God calls all of us to help each other.

lender.name: The Pynn Family
lender.loan_because: Our family is blessed with good health, job security, and opportunity. Lending through Kiva is our way to share our blessings with others in the hope that they may also enjoy prosperous futures.
lender.occupational_info: Our family currently works in many occupations. These range from technology and health care to finance and retail services. We also have been employed in politics, law enforcement, aeronautics, food service, education, and video communications industries. Our varying experiences and backgrounds have taught us that a little generosity can result in wonderful outcomes.

lender.name: The Fish Five
lender.loan_because: we want our children to understand that this is a huge world we live in, and we get to look out for one another - we all have our gifts, they're meant to be shared.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a church as a person who encourages families as they raise their children to follow Jesus.

lender.name: CAITLIN
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Annemarie
lender.loan_because: I think I have an obligation to support others, because I am supported and blessed by so many people around me. Like a beautiful lady said 'in being a blessing to others, you will be blessed'

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: On January 8th 2009 my family and I were at the La Paz waterfalls when a major earthquake struck the area. Ticos helped to evacuate my family and supported my wife and children after we lost our car seats and baby supplies at the site of the earthquake. This is my way of giving back and saying thank you.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I am fascinated by the concept and love the idea of seeing things grow.
lender.occupational_info: I am a reporter for a small town newspaper

lender.name: Evan and Jen
lender.loan_because: We feel it's important to help create opportunities for those less fortunate than us. Loaning is a way to empower people to better their situations.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: it is the best way to help people out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to small children in South Kora

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: it is my deep conviction that every person finds dignity and meaning in work.
lender.occupational_info: I advise business students on short and long term career planning.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: This is such an amazing idea for sustainable aide. Other sites say that $25 will feed a family for a month, but here my $25 contributes to feeding a family indefinately.
lender.occupational_info: I have a part time job in an office and am studying finance at University.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in Karma what you put out comes back to you....
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hotel, I check people in and make sure they are happy.

lender.name: Kelly Errzie
lender.loan_because: i want to open small business

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Not sure why. With the first one, I just felt a leading, even though when I first heard about Kiva I had a lot of questions, and still do. But, we shouldn't resist the Spirit's leading. May God bless with the amount that I perceive as small, yet may make a large difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work two jobs a lot of hours. But the work I want to glory most, is the desire to hear: "Well, done good and faithful servant." From my Lord Jesus. Thought I stumble, this is my hearts work, the work of the gospel.

lender.name: Serena
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people in Africa to help the economic position of the entire country, and help others the way God asked us to
lender.occupational_info: I work with farmers - looking after their animals. I also lead a youth group at the local church

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I see how poverty affects families in the U.S. and want to make a difference where things are even worse than they are here. One little loan can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of new mothers and thier babies in a low income community.

lender.name: Leonie
lender.loan_because: 'To whom much is given - much is required !' I am very blessed to live very well in the beautiful south Island of New Zealand with my husband and daughter. It's fantastic to partner with Kiva to aid others in working towards a better lifestyle for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a Preschool of 86 children aged 0-5.Our many staff lovingly care for and educate these children, while their parents go out to work. Rob, India and i love to sail our Trailer Yacht and go camping.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help someone out with startup capital
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers for large business systems

lender.name: rob
lender.occupational_info: I work in the mobile phone industry.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I am able to
lender.occupational_info: I'm an American living in Japan. I am the principal of a bilingual (English & Japanese) school. My wife is Japanese but we have no children (just two dogs!).

lender.name: Mollie
lender.loan_because: I believe individuals are the most qualified to determine their needs and how to achieve them. I see micro-credit as a way to give more people in this world a chance to achieve their goals and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student of sustainable development. I hope to better understand the way forward to a ecologically sound, socially just and prosperous world.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: the money comes out clean on the other side.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I build docks for boats to tie up to.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to actively contribute to a better world. It's also rewarding to see people take responsibility for themselves and encourage small business.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for magazines and websites as well as teach writing at a university.

lender.name: Sune
lender.occupational_info: I work with rehabilitation of people with longstanding pain.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The world "is" getting smaller. Either we, the population of our planet Earth, learn and work to live together, or...eventually, we perish together.
lender.occupational_info: Assembling, and focusing the talents of, diverse professionals to achieve a particular goal.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: we're lucky enough to be able to share. Our contribution may not matter much to us but it makes a big difference in the lives of others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I organise art exhibitions for museums.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I lead a team of 10 people in ensuring that our factory has enough work to keep building products for sale

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can, and there are those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and produce computer software that brings inexpensive communication abilities to people around the world.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: i am working in a small computer and network office. my work is to manage e.g. servers, network devices and so on

lender.name: Kandace
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: College student

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: If you are willing to earn an honest living you don't need charity... but sometimes you can use a little help. My hope is that my little can go along away in helping.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Evelyne
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be who I am

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It is good to share even a small portion.

lender.name: Bruce Wayne
lender.loan_because: Not everyone in America is an ignorant fool...
lender.occupational_info: Complicated but well worth it.

lender.name: Sten
lender.loan_because: Giving / lending small sums to people can change the world in a positive direction. If you have a regular income, you won't even notice a 25$ now or 50$ then, but for poor people it really mean a lot.

lender.name: Roger& Cindy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us greatly through many trials and now we can show God's love to those whose road is harder than ours.
lender.occupational_info: Roger works in a hospital treating the sick and injured people of the island. Cindy teaches Spanish, French, and English in a Christian School. Money raised from our online store sales is used to help entrepreneurs here in the Virgin Islands or elswhere in the world.

lender.name: SHERWIN
lender.loan_because: MAKING THE WORLD A BETTER PLACE THAN I FOUND. GIVING JUST A CUP OF WATER ACROSS THE OCEAN AS JESUS TOLD US TO DO! SHARING OF MY BLESSINGS FROM GOD WITH OTHERS IN NEED!
lender.occupational_info: PROVIDING SAFE AND PROMPT TRANSPORTATION SERVICES FOR SPECIAL NEEDS CLIENTS FROM HOME TO WORK AND FROM WORK TO HOME.

lender.name: Lior
lender.loan_because: For my Bat Mitzvah, I decided to make a MItzvah, which is making a good deed, thus lending some of my money that I got, to give others a chance.

lender.name: Natural
lender.loan_because: it renews my spirit. there is so much awful in this world and this is so much wonderful.

lender.name: stefan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people enjoy the struggle and reward that is self business
lender.occupational_info: I fix houses and machines for myself and neighbors. I can fix anything.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I don't have a church to take my annual percentage of donations.
lender.occupational_info: I write websites and other codes that make computers work.

lender.name: Samir
lender.loan_because: Islam tells us to help others so please help and make Dua for me. Sadakah Al Jaria.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I am grateful.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference in the lives of many.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I used to be an entrepreneur and now that I can afford it, I like to support other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help journalists finding information.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: my friend got me a gift card and I love this cause. My husband and I plan on donating again.
lender.occupational_info: Find best ways to get goods from one location to another.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I believe every entrepreneur deserves access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to provide financial and operational advice and investment needed to grow.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: We were put here to help each other and Kiva is a great way to do that!!

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: My life has been bought by the blood of Jesus Christ and I desire to share his love with the world around me by loving my neighbors with the gifts and resources he has given me.

lender.name: JackPrague
lender.loan_because: Actions speak louder than words.
lender.occupational_info: Stumbling through life.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: It supports people's hopes and dreams.

lender.name: Ulrich
lender.loan_because: I think helping someone to start or improve his business by the KIVA system might be the best way to get a sustained yield in the area where the micro-lendings are placed.
lender.occupational_info: Software Development for a large website

lender.name: Stian
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Do testing on automobiles to reduce emissons.

lender.name: Eulyses
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I am learning how to be a "listener."
